  • Latest release: 0.8.14

Changelog

0.8.13 (05-18-2013)

Core

  • More tests

    More unit tests and integration tests have been added.

  • AJAX sources

    From this release, you have to configure yourself the URL used to populate your AJAX-enabled tables (the context path won’t be prepended any longer). All existing tutorials have been updated accordingly.

JSP implementation
  • New dom table attribute, allowing you to specify exactly where in the DOM you want DataTables to inject the various controls it adds to the page.
  • New selector column attribute, which is a jQuery selector used to populate a placeholder with a filtering widgets (e.g. useful if you want externalized search form)
Thymeleaf implementation
  • New dt:dom table attribute.
  • New dt:selector th attribute.
Issues
  • issue #100 (Fix base.url configuration point)
  • issue #101 (Add support for cssStyle and cssClass when using AJAX source)
  • issue #102 (“TypeError: oColumn is undefined” on DOM when data is a empty list )
  • issue #103 (Support dynamic value for the column’s “visible” attribute)
  • issue #105 (Not all existing properties did appear as “valid” )
  • issue #106 (Add support for sDom parameter)
  • issue #107 (Add support for sSelector parameter of the ColumnFilter plugin)
  • issue #109 (Conflict between the Bootstrap2 theme and basic features enablement)

0.8.12 (05-03-2013)

Core

  • dandelion.dev.mode enabled by default

    Now you don’t need to set the dandelion.dev.mode system property to true to disable caching. Caching is disabled by default, which means the DataTables configuration is computed each time you access a page.

  • Performance improvement

    The DisplayType object, used in export, is now instantiated much less time than before.

JSP implementation
  • New visible column attribute, allowing you to hide column. Note that a hidden column is automatically unsearchable.
Thymeleaf implementation
  • dt:export, dt:exportLinks and dt:filterType attributes don’t expect a Thymeleaf expression any longer. Actually you can use both header-coded values and Thymeleaf Standard expressions.
  • New dt:visible column attribute, allowing you to hide column. Note that a hidden column is automatically unsearchable.
Issues
  • issue #31 (Error when the table’s id is generated with the “th:id” processor)
  • issue #49 (Performance : improve DisplayType feature)
  • issue #76 (Add support for hidden columns)
  • issue #82 (Make the dt:filtertype values unnecessary to process)
  • issue #83 (Exclude dt:export/dt:exportLinks from being processed by Thymeleaf Standard Expression)
  • issue #85 (Improve tag’s values validation)
  • issue #86 (Enable the dev mode by default)
  • issue #87 (rel attribute is missing in link tags)

0.8.11 (04-21-2013)

Core
  • Lots of unit and integration tests added
  • Export links are now added in the fnInitComplete callback
  • Callbacks have been refactored to avoid conflict between features that use the same callback
  • Features that was already avaible using DOM sources are available using AJAX sources (sortInit, sortDirection, cssClass, cssStyle, …)
  • All StringBuffer have been replaced by StringBuilder, for performance concern
JSP implementation
  • New cssStripes table attribute
  • New format column attribute allowing you to use MessageFormat patterns
  • New displayLength table attribute
  • New scrollCollapse table attribute
  • New scrollY table attribute
  • New implicit object available inside the <datatables:table> tag : rowIndex
  • New lengthChange table attribute
Thymeleaf implementation
  • New dt:stripesclasses table attribute
  • New dt:displaylength table attribute
  • New scrollcollapse table attribute
  • New scrolly table attribute
  • Datatables attributes are now processed using the Thymeleaf Standard expression
  • New lengthchange table attribute
Issues
  • issue #27 (Add support for asStripeClasses parameter enhancement JSP)
  • issue #56 (Add Support for Column Formatting with MessageFormat patterns)
  • issue #61 (Add support for iDisplayLength)
  • issue #62 (Add support for bScrollCollapse)
  • issue #64 (Make the rowIndex available as a variable in the page scope)
  • issue #66 (The data:url attribute must be processed using the Standard Expressions)
  • issue #70 (Add support for lengthChange enhancement)
  • issue #71 (NPE in DataCriterias.getFromRequest(request) when request hasn’t iSortingCols parameter)
  • issue #74 (Problems with how export links are added to the table)
  • issue #77 (column.cssStyle and column.cssClass ignored on AJAX mode)
  • issue #79 (Column display is ignored in HTML in Ajax table)
  • issue #81 (Fix the internal callbacks conflict)

0.8.10 (03-27-2013)

Issues
  • issue #58 (stripeclasses table attribute is missing)
  • issue #59 (servermethod attribute is mapped to an object instead of a string)

0.8.9 (03-26-2013)

Core
  • All classes/interfaces have been logically reorganized
  • All POMs cleaned, updated some dependencies
  • New configuration available, called url.base, allowing you to override the base URL used in all URLs (assets sources, export links)
  • The sSearch_(int) DataTables parameter is now parsed in DatatablesCriterias, allowing you to filter data on individual column when using server-side processing
JSP implementation
  • New datatables:callback tag, allowing you to execute one or more callbacks
  • New lengthMenu table attribute, allowing you to adapt the length menu (when pagination is enabled)
  • New cssStripes table attribute, allowing you to set an array of CSS classes that will be apply on the table’s rows
  • New serverData and serverParam table attributes, allowing you to custom the AJAX call
Thymeleaf implementation
  • All attribute and element processors now use the new abstract Datatables processors
  • New dt:processing attribute
  • New callback-related tbody attributes : dt:cbk:cookie, dt:cbk:createdrow, dt:cbk:draw, dt:cbk:footer, dt:cbk:format, dt:cbk:header, dt:cbk:info, dt:cbk:init, dt:cbk:predraw and dt:cbk:row
  • New dt:lengthmenu table attribute, allowing you to adapt the length menu (when pagination is enabled)
  • New dt:sortinit and dt:sortdir th attributes, allowing you to initiliaze the sort
  • New dt:stripclasses table attributes, allowing you to define a sequence of CSS classes that will be applied on each row
  • New dt:serverdata and dt:serverparams table attributes, allowing you to custom the AJAX call
Issues
  • issue #24 (Add the possibility to define the length menu)
  • issue #25 (Add support for sorting initialisation)
  • issue #26 (Add support for sorting direction control)
  • issue #27 (Add support for asStripeClasses parameter)
  • issue #38 (Add custom javascript after “server-side” call)
  • issue #43 (Handling column filters with server-side processing)
  • issue #47 (Add extension points based on DataTables callbacks)
  • issue #48 (Also parse sSearch_(int) before sending parameter to the server)
  • issue #50 (dt:processing attribute is missing in Thymeleaf implementation)
  • issue #52 (Add a configuration allowing to override the base URL used in all URLs (assets, export))
  • issue #55 (Support for customed AJAX calls)

0.8.8 (03-20-2013)

Core
  • Better performance : the configuration file is now loaded only once
  • Code cleaning
JSP implementation
  • Tests reorganization
  • More integration tests
Thymeleaf implementation
  • New dt:exportLinks attribute, allowing you to configure the export links’ position
  • New dt:paginationtype attribute, allowing you to configure the pagination type
  • Lots of new Thymeleaf attributes added to configure export. See the documentation for more details
Issues
  • issue #12 (Improve export using Thymeleaf)
  • issue #14 (Add dt:paginationtype Thymeleaf processor)
  • issue #28 (Add the possibility to configure export link style and position)
  • issue #29 (Add the possibility to configure export with Thymeleaf)
  • issue #44 (Performance : load Dandelion properties only once)

0.8.7 (03-15-2013)

Core
  • New renderFunction / dt:renderFunction (JSP/Thymeleaf) allowing you to use a custom Javascript function to render columns in tables AJAX-populated
Issues
  • issue #30 (Export links generation)
  • issue #36 (Problem with tld file on JBoss 6)
  • issue #41 (Caching problems with URL that have params)
  • issue #45 (test-jetty-servlet dependency not marked as a test dependency)

0.8.6 (03-05-2013)

Major changes
  • New release management : now, all JARs (core and extras) have the same version number. This will be much clearer and simpler for both developers and users.
  • New cache system : a huge performance issue has been raised by Julien Dubois during his stress test of the Spring-petclinic app. It has been fixed setting up a basic cache system (a static Map at the moment) that stores the generated web resources (js, css) per request URI and per table DOM id. This way, the DataTables configuration (and other needed assets) are generated only once and then are stored in the AssetCache. So no need to use the ServletContext any longer, which was decreasing performance.
Minor changes
  • Added a new searchable / dt:searchable attributes (JSP/Thymeleaf) to exclude column from searching
Issues
  • issue #30 (Export links generation)
  • issue #32 (Exclude column from searching)
  • issue #34 (Memory leak)
  • issue #35 (Wrong use of EVAL_PAGE in the doStartTag method of the ColumnTag)
  • issue #36 (Problem with tld file on JBoss 6)

0.8.5 (02-23-2013)

  • Issues
    • issue #19 (Shift in the first row if a columnTag has a body)
    • issue #20 (ExportLink position issue when Bootstrap2 theme enabled)

0.8.4 (02-21-2013)

  • DataTables4j has became Dandelion-datatables! See the migration guide!
  • Issues
    • issue #16 (Dynamic value for table's id)
    • issue #17 (Table display issue)

0.8.3 (02-11-2013)

  • Core
    • New default/dt:default attributes, allowing you to set default value in case of null values
  • Modules
    • Servlet2 module moved inside the core-parent (for easier distribution) Warning : artifactId has changed to datatables4j-servlet2
  • Issues
    • issue #24 (Regression using plugins)
    • issue #25 (scope issue is modules)
    • issue #29 (Sorting issue when using server-side processing)
    • issue #31 (Icons in Bootstrap Theme)
    • issue #32 (Handling null values)

0.8.2 (01-31-2013)

  • Core
    • AJAX sources support, using the url/dt:url attributes
    • Server-side processing support and new utility classes !
    • New appear/dt:appear attributes, allowing you to choose how the table will appear when he has finished loading
    • New serverSide/dt:serverside attributes, that enable server-side processing
    • New pipelining/dt:pipelining attributes, to enable data pipelining on paging
    • New pipeSize/dt:pipesize attributes, to define the pipe size when pipelining is enabled
    • New dt:property Thymeleaf attribute, used with dt:url for AJAX sources
    • New dt:labels Thymeleaf attribute, for DataTables i18n support
  • Modules
    • New Spring3 module (at the moment, only used to have a full Spring integration with server-side processing)
    • AJAX-Jersey module removed, no need anymore due to AJAX support in datatables4j-core
  • Issues
    • issue #18 (Wrong MIME type for XLS export)
    • issue #17 (XLS and XLSX exports currently not working)
    • issue #16 (i18n support for the Thymeleaf version)
    • issue #15 (Design issue during DataTables loading)
    • issue #12 (Server-side processing support)

0.8.1 (01-20-2013)

  • Core
    • Thymeleaf support ! (Even if lots of features still need to be supported...)
    • Concept of "theme" added, new theme and themeOption table attributes
    • New themes based on Bootstrap2 and jQuery UI ThemeRoller
    • New display column attribute : you can now choose which column(s) you want to appear (only in a particular export, only in HTML, or both)
    • New autoSize export attribute (only for Excel exports)
    • Export classes have been updated to handle binary exports (like XLS or PDF)
    • Using custom classes for export is now possible
    • New values available for paginationType table attribute : four_button, bootstrap, scrolling, input, listbox, extJs
    • DataTables Column Filter Add-on by Jovan Popovic added (for now, only filterType is supported, with INPUT and SELECT values)
    • Lots of code duplication removed
  • Modules
    • New Excel (XLS) Export module using Apache POI
    • New Excel (XLSX) Export module using Apache POI (OOXML)
    • New PDF Export module using iText
  • Issues
    • issue #5 (Custom header column)
    • issue #9 (Thymeleaf integration)
    • issue #10 (FixedColumns plugin integration)
    • issue #11 (CDN attribute in https context)

0.7.0 (11-30-2012)

  • Core
    • Servlet 3.0 support (Warning : install section has been updated)
    • Jackson mapper dependency replaced by Google json-simple one (lighter)
    • Basic export functionality (for now CSV and XML are supported) with customizable output filename, export link position, ... See more details
    • New export and exportLinks table attributes (to enable export and set one or several links positions)
    • New Export tag (to configure one export\'s type)
    • Javascript and JSON configuration are now pretty printed (as much as possible :-))
    • More documentation (Javadoc et web site)
    • DataTables4j now released under the BSD 3-Clause licence
  • Modules
    • New backward compatibility module for Servlet 2.x
    • YUI Compression module : compression option (munge, preserve semi-colons, disable optimizations) are now externalized in the DataTables4j properties file
  • Demo apps
    • The main demo is now deployed in a Tomcat 7 container (Servlet 3.0)
    • New Features > Export examples
    • Features > Aggregation section updated
    • New demo using the backward compatibility module for Servlet 2.x deployed to CloudBees
  • Bug
    • Fix for issue #1 (The prop tag affects all tables, not just the current one)
    • Fix for issue #3 (EL in title attribute of the column tag)

0.6.0 (11-10-2012)

  • Core
    • Creation of a wrapper for API and implementation "datatable4j-core", for maven users
    • Creation of a standalone version of this wrapper "datatable4j-core-*-standalone.jar", for other users
    • Main servlet uses Servlet 3.0, changing prerequisites. See install for more details.
    • Now in Maven Central !

0.5.0-SNAPSHOT (10-07-2012)

  • Core
    • Concept of "feature" (e.g. filtering) and FeatureLoader added
    • New column filtering attributes filterType, filterCssClass and filterPlaceholder
    • New column sorting attributes sortInit and sortDirection
    • New table attribute jqueryUI
    • Properties loading improved (allowing to remove slf4j dependency from core-api)
    • Random number is now unique per table (if several files need to be generated for a table)
    • Generalization of the initialization-on-demand holder strategy for singletons
    • Packages and classes reorganization, this is much clearer ! (Warning : the main servlet is now in org.datatables4j.core.web.servlet.*, not in org.datatables4j.web.servlet.* anymore)
    • License notices attached to the start of eeeeaach file ...
  • Demo application
    • New example for filterType, filterCssClass and filterPlaceholder attributes (see here)
    • New example for sortInit and sortDirection attributes (see here)

0.4.0-SNAPSHOT (10-02-2012)

  • Core
    • i18n support via labels attribute
    • lengthChange added
    • Jersey and YUICompressor dependencies removed and externalized in modules
    • commons-io dependency removed
    • Code cleaning
    • Comments added
  • Demo application
    • New example for i18n support
    • New example for plugins combo and aggregation added

0.3.0-SNAPSHOT (09-27-2012)

  • Core
    • Code cleaning
  • Demo application
    • Doc tag added to generate documentation links
    • All JSP updated with new taglib URI
    • Added plugins and features section

0.2.0-SNAPSHOT (09-25-2012)

  • Core
    • New TLD URI
    • Servlet API version downgraded to 2.5
    • Fix for properties file loading
  • Demo application
    • TLD URI updated
    • Added DataTables4j servlet definition

0.1.0-SNAPSHOT (09-24-2012)

  • Code refactoring
  • Lots of comments added
  • New attribute offsetTop for fixedHeader module
  • URL cleaning for files served by the Datatables4jServlet
  • POM update for new snapshot and Cloudbees integration
  • Demo application deployed on Cloudbees !

0.0.0-SNAPSHOT (09-10-2012)

  • Project initialisation
